name: Yellow Squash (Summer Squash)
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - vegetables category
Rich in vitamins C, A, and antioxidants
benefits: Yellow squash (also called summer squash) contains approximately 94% water, making it one of the most effective vegetables for calorie dilution and weight loss. As an aboveground vegetable highest on the water scale, it's ideal for optimizing weight loss meals. Its mild flavor pairs well with other vegetables in recipes.
amount: 1 yellow squash, cut into ½-inch/1cm dice

quotes: 1 yellow squash, cut into ½-inch/1cm dice
1 small courgette or yellow squash, cut into ¼-inch/5mm dice
